product_name: Benefit CosmeticsPrecisely, My Brow Detailer Microfine Waterproof Eyebrow Pencil
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingWith a teeny-tiny 0.8 mm tip, Precisely, My Brow Detailer draws on itty-bitty, clean-crisp lines for a polished look. The firm, precise tip with a creamy - smooth texture glides onto brows for comfortable, controlled application. Plus, it's natural-looking, buildable and blendable.
details: DetailsBenefitsCreates hair-like microfine linesAdds precise detail, dimension & depth to browsTiniest brow pencil tip out there (yep, we checked)12-hour* wearWaterproof & smudge-proofBuilt-in blending spoolieProtective retraction technology keeps the delicate tip safe*instrumental test on 25 participantsResearch Results92% said it creates precise, microfine lines**92% said it adds dimension to brows**92% said it defines edges of brows**93% said it gives clean, crisp lines**93% said when used with Precisely, My Brow Pencil, it adds depth & detail to your brows****self-evaluation by 107 participants after 1 weekItem 2620395How To UseTIPS & TRICKS:Twist up until tip is level with clear protective tubing & stop right there. (Exposing the tip too much may cause it to break!) Then, apply with light, gentle strokes in the direction of your natural hair growth. Blend with spoolie.Beauty Tip:Pair with Precisely, My Brow Pencil (sold separately) for a multidimensional, extra precise look.IngredientsStearic Acid, Mica, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Synthetic Japan Wax, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Triethylhexanoin, Jojoba Esters, Aluminum Hydroxide, Tocopherol. [+/- CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)].Disclaimer: product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a benefit product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: TIPS & TRICKS:Twist up until tip is level with clear protective tubing & stop right there. (Exposing the tip too much may cause it to break!) Then, apply with light, gentle strokes in the direction of your natural hair growth. Blend with spoolie.Beauty Tip:Pair with Precisely, My Brow Pencil (sold separately) for a multidimensional, extra precise look.
ingredients: please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use

reviews.headline: Breaks off too easily
reviews.comments: When pencil is raised, it breaks off very easily. I feel that i have wasted so much product.

reviews.headline: Best EVER
reviews.comments: I've been using the Microfine Pencil for a couple of years! Works GREAT!  easy to use and is very fine.  Only thing, since it's so fine, you do not want to over extend the tip.  keep it very short and you won't have a problem with the tip breaking off.

reviews.headline: LOVE IT - but you have to use it properly
reviews.comments: I need this micro pencil every day to draw lifelike hair strokes on my brows. I can get a nice, thin line with this that I can't achieve with the thicker "precisely my brow" pencil. But you have to use this properly so it doesn't break off. DO NOT EXTEND THE TIP PAST THE PLASTIC! When you use it this way, it will not break. The only downside for me: I touch my eyes and face a lot during the day and the pencil strokes will brush off easily in my opinion. I wish these didn't smudge or budge. Also - I go through a micro pencil in about 4-6 weeks, so wish they lasted longer for the price.

reviews.headline: benefit eyebrow pencil
reviews.comments: one of the best eyebrow pencils around, i stock up when they go on sale, so natural looking

reviews.headline: Keeps breaking
reviews.comments: Dispute the plastic guard at the tip, how minimally I  advance the pencil or how gently I apply it the tip of the pencil breaks off and lodged in my brow hairs. Frustratingly wasteful of time and money. Returning this product

reviews.headline: Didn't last long, breaks
reviews.comments: The only thing I can say is that I would not buy this again. I'll stick with the precisley brow that I've been using for years with no issue. If it ain't broke don't fix it is so very true!

reviews.headline: No match for natural redheads
reviews.comments:
I don't know what product they used on the redheaded model for shade 3 light medium brown, but I have her same hair color and I can tell you it wasn't this product in that
 color. After using this product my eyebrows are brown, no hint of red at all. I love how the product goes on, but they need a better shade for natural redheads. I'll stick to using the brow powder from Anastasia of Beverly Hills.

reviews.headline: Save your money
reviews.comments: I have very thin brows and over the years, I have tried every kind of brow fillers, from pencil, powder, to pomade. I always use light hand pressure to apply all my makeup. The first several times I applied the color, the pencil broke. Not once. Not twice, but almost every time. The money spent on this brow detailer pencil was wasted. NYX brow blade beat this hands down, with more money in my pocket.

reviews.headline: Would be great if..
reviews.comments:
I love the way this product works, but the amount of breakage is really ridiculous.
Even with the minimal amount of product extended, it break. 
Less than two weeks and its gone.
I will be sticking with the original.

reviews.headline: good brow pencil, but since critiques
reviews.comments:
So I have two other brow pencils from Benefit from this line.. I will say this one has the softest most easily applicable formula. you need little to absolutely no pressure. you actually have to use little to no pressure and have barely any of the product twisted up or it will break off (learned the hard way). nice filler, decent color match IMO, but there is NO WAY it has 12hr wear. the first try I filled in the edges of my brows and used the brush to soften and it basically wiped away all the color. tried a second with a bit more luck but still a lot of color lost . I think the only way to get this to last half a day is with a brow gel on top. overall I like it. again I like how easily I get color compared to my old brow pencils from this line that kinda sucks. I will be keeping, but it's not a 5 star for sure. 

light blonde/taupe brows, long wiry brow hairs (the kind that curl and if you pluck one then half your brow is gone). 35yo F, blonde hair

reviews.headline: Save your money.
reviews.comments: The product is way too fragile even when you are mindful of how much you extend it. It is a pain to find the length where you can actually see the lines but are not at risk of it breaking. For the price, this shouldnt be an issue. There are $5 products that can give you the same effect with no frustration.

reviews.headline: Never will purchase again
reviews.comments: This brow pencil didn't even last a week! It kept breaking off. I was so excited when I found out they had a new golden brown, and waterproof, because I'm reddish-blonde and it's hard to find the right eyebrow color.  The auburns are too red, blonde is too taupe, and medium brown is too dark in other pencils. I was so disappointed in this product. ðŸ˜ž

reviews.headline: Best brow tool
reviews.comments: I use this to fill in gaps - results in a natural looking brow, not drawn on

reviews.headline: If you're breaking it, You're doing it wrong!
reviews.comments: Maybe Benefit should've given more warning and education about this product, but it really is incredible. The brows come out so perfect and defined every single time. BUT, if you screw up the pencil more than a teensy tiny bit, yes it'll break. Just turn it up a very small amount and you'll stop breaking it!

reviews.headline: Perfect detailer
reviews.comments: My eyebrows started falling out in 2023 due to some health issues and now I have hardly any eyebrows. The Precisely My Brow Fine Detailer in 3.5 is perfect for me but I was missing an even finer detailer in the right shade until this micro detailer. After I draw in the outer 3/4 of my brows, I brush to soften and diffuse the color with the spoolie so the inside of the brows have somr color. I then carefully draw in hairs on the inner 1/4 of my brows. I brush out to diffuse snd add more hair strokes as needed. If my brows need more shaping or shading, I go back in with the bigger pencil until I get my brows right. This is a detailer pencil so you should only be lightly drawing in hair strokes. Press lightly! This pencil is not for filling in your brows.

reviews.headline: User error
reviews.comments: Its exhausting sometimes when these brands create products thay are so perfect but people dont take the time to learn to use them, and then leave bad reviews. The clear plastic tip pushes back when you put pressure on it. It stabilizes the fine tip. So twist up so the product is just at the end of the clear tip. Ive literally never had it break and I use it every day. Ive also never run out and its been months. It looks like hairs, so you really dont need many strokes to fill in sparse areas. I absolutely love this. No more block brows!

reviews.headline: Just no buy the regular
reviews.comments: I buy the regular precisely my brow so i thought i would try this for a more fine line. This pencil breaks off too easily, which made me go through it in a month and the regular one usually lasts me a few months. Also the packaging is wack, it kept basically falling apart in my hands. Too expensive for this quality

reviews.headline: Terrible
reviews.comments: Planning to return, the applicator is horrible and continues to break no matter how gentle you are.

reviews.headline: First time buyer
reviews.comments: I must say this product did not disappoint. I've been using the brow definer for years and when I bought this it was exactly what I was looking for.

reviews.headline: I won't buy it again
reviews.comments: If you twist it too much the pencil will break. Sometimes its barely out and it breaks off. It upsets me every time ðŸ˜© Its an expensive eye brow pencil and im just wasting it. I will go back to NYX.

faceoff_positive.comments:
Gifted by Benefit Cosmetics they have once again raised the bar with their new Precisely, My Brow Detailer Microfine Waterproof Eyebrow Pencil. As a fan of their previous brow products, I had high expectations, and I can confidently say that this pencil did not disappoint.This design allows for precise application and effortless blending. The microfine pencil tip is incredibly thin, allowing for precise and natural-looking hair-like strokes. It glides smoothly onto the brows without any tugging or smudging. I was impressed with how easily I could fill in sparse areas and shape my brows to perfection.
One of the standout features of this eyebrow pencil is its waterproof formula. Once applied, it stays put all day, even through sweat and humidity. I never have to worry about my brows smudging or fading, giving me confidence that my brows will look flawless from morning to night. The shade range of the Precisely, My Brow Detailer Microfine Waterproof Eyebrow Pencil is extensive, catering to a wide range of hair colors and undertones. I was able to find the perfect shade that matched my natural brows seamlessly. I also appreciate the inclusion of the spoolie brush on the other end of the pencil. It is perfect for combing through the brows and blending the product for a more natural finish. The brush is soft and gentle, ensuring that I can achieve a polished look without any harsh lines. Overall, I highly recommend Benefit Cosmetics' new Precisely, My Brow Detailer Microfine Waterproof Eyebrow Pencil. It delivers on its promise of precise application, long-lasting wear, and a natural-looking finish. With its convenient packaging and impressive formula, it has become an essential part of my everyday makeup routine.
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing they did it again

faceoff_negative.comments: I have sparse brows due to over plucking and a scar from a car accident that goes through one of my brows.  When I purchased the Precisely micro product about  18 months ago, it was a game changer for me and gave me the ability to create natural looking structure and symmetry. I used it daily in combination with Pow-Made gel product.  It was a full size automatic pencil that lasted well over 8 months. The stroke was so realistic and the product was sturdy.  When I ran out recently, I purchased the new version.  The product broke frequently and I ran out within a month.  The pencil was about 25-30% smaller than the first one I purchased.  I purchased the regular pencil, but it's just not the same application and effect.  Please bring back the old model.
faceoff_negative.headline: Please go back one iteration
